For those who are scholars of the Edo period, amateur or otherwise,
Tamura'=
s home domain of Iwakidaira is important-- it was the domain of
Ando Tsushi=
ma-no-Kami Nobumasa, who was a successor of the (in)famous
Ii Naosuke, and =
was almost murdered like him.

Again, for those who can make use of Japanes=
